label: parse_args
main
peekOfCode:
def main(args: Optional[List[str]] = None) -> int:
    parsed_args = parse_args(args)
    outfp = extract_text(**vars(parsed_args))
    outfp.close()
    return 0
if __name__ == "__main__":
    sys.exit(main())
